what_is.title: What is Corporate Restructuring?
what_is.description: Corporate restructuring is a legal process that gives companies with temporary financial difficulties the opportunity to get back on track without bankruptcy. Through restructuring, the company receives protection from creditors and time to reorganize operations.

step1.title: 1. Application
step1.description: The company applies for restructuring with the district court. We help you prepare the application and all necessary documentation.

step2.title: 2. Assessment
step2.description: The court assesses whether the company has the prerequisites for successful restructuring and appoints a restructuring administrator.

step3.title: 3. Restructuring Plan
step3.description: A detailed plan is developed for how the company will recover financially and become profitable again.

step4.title: 4. Implementation
step4.description: The plan is implemented under supervision of the restructuring administrator. We continuously monitor the process.
